price: (Allah) berfirman, "Jangan takut (mereka tidak akan dapat membunuhmu)! Maka pergilah kamu berdua dengan membawa ayat-ayat Kami (mukjizat-mukjizat); sungguh, Kami bersamamu mendengarkan (apa yang mereka katakan).
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā fa-idh'habā biāyātinā innā maʿakum mus'tamiʿūna
